definition: inconsistent with reason or logic or common sense, a situation in which life seems irrational and meaningless
details:
adjective
- inconsistent with reason or logic or common sense
= example: inconsistent with reason or logic or common sense
- incongruous
= synonyms: ridiculous
noun
- a situation in which life seems irrational and meaningless
= example: a situation in which life seems irrational and meaningless
